articles.title: Forza Horizon 6 Release Date May Have Leaked Ahead Of Next Week's Developer Direct
articles.summary: Forza Horizon 6 is one of several games set to headline a new Developer Direct livestream from Xbox, and it looks like the game's release date may have leaked early. According to the leaks, Forza Horizon 6 will reportedly launch on May 19, while the Premium Edition of the game will allow buyers to start playing four days early on May 15.Xbox Infinite--an Xbox news site based in Saudi Arabia--posted an image of what it claims is an in-game announcement from Forza Horizon 5, detailing the Forza Horizon 6 release date and DLC that will be available in the Premium Edition. VGC corroborated the claims, saying that its sources had confirmed that this is the correct release date for the game. According to the image, the Premium Edition will offer early access, VIP membership, car packs, an exclusive Ferrari, and post-launch car pack DLC.ğŸŸ©| Ø¹Ø§Ø¬Ù„ ÙˆØ­ØµØ±ÙŠ ğŸš¨ğŸš¨Ù„Ø¹Ø¨Ø© [ Forza Horizon 6 ] Ø³ØªØµØ¯Ø± ÙÙŠ 19 Ù…Ø§ÙŠÙˆ 2026â€¢ Ø¥Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ù† Ø¸Ù‡Ø± Ø¯Ø§Ø®Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ø¨Ø© pic.twitter.com/vW1RVI7roP  â€” XBOX INFINITE (@XBOXF10) January 14, 2026              Forza Horizon 6 was officially revealed ahead of the Xbox showcase at Tokyo Game Show last year, and the next chapter in the racing series will see the Horizon Festival move to Japan. It'll launch on PC and Xbox Series X|S first, with a PS5 release date to follow. Forza Horizon 5 launched on PS5 last year, and the game proved a huge success on the Sony platform, selling over 5.1 million units.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Eidos Montreal Is Reportedly Working On A Big-Budget Game Similar To Wild
articles.summary: The canceled open-world game Wild may get a spiritual successor of sorts from Deus Ex: Human Revolution developer Eidos Montreal. According to Insider Gaming, the unannounced title is codenamed P11 and features intriguing likenesses to the canned Ubisoft game.The report also states that P11 has been in development since 2019, with Unreal Engine 5 powering the project. However, Insider Gaming adds there have been "significant setbacks" for the game. In 2024, Embracer Group canned a Deus Ex game in development and cut 97 people from Eidos Montreal. The layoffs didn't stop there, either. Last year, another 75 employees lost their jobs at the studio.As for P11, an X user named Timur222 found that an Eidos Montreal employee on LinkedIn refers to the project as a "AAAA" game. Insider Gaming initially thought that Embracer may have somehow acquired the Wild rights from Ubisoft because this project looks so similar. Wild was revealed in 2014, showing players riding a bear and even assuming the control of an eagle and rabbit. The PlayStation exclusive was reportedly canceled in 2021.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.long_summary: The canceled open-world game Wild may get a spiritual successor of sorts from Deus Ex: Human Revolution developer Eidos Montreal. According to Insider Gaming, the unannounced title is codenamed P11 and features intriguing likenesses to the canned Ubisoft game.The report also states that P11 has been in development since 2019, with Unreal Engine 5 powering the project. However, Insider Gaming adds there have been "significant setbacks" for the game. In 2024, Embracer Group canned a Deus Ex game i

articles.title: Scientists finally uncover why statins cause muscle pain
articles.summary: A new discovery may explain why so many people abandon cholesterol-lowering statins because of muscle pain and weakness. Researchers found that certain statins can latch onto a key muscle protein and trigger a tiny but harmful calcium leak inside muscle cells. That leak may weaken muscles directly or activate processes that slowly break them down, offering a long-sought explanation for statin-related aches.
articles.long_summary: A new discovery may explain why so many people abandon cholesterol-lowering statins because of muscle pain and weakness. Researchers found that certain statins can latch onto a key muscle protein and trigger a tiny but harmful calcium leak inside muscle cells. That leak may weaken muscles directly or activate processes that slowly break them down, offering a long-sought explanation for statin-related aches.

articles.title: Civilization 7 Is Finally Coming To Mobile, Exclusively On Apple Arcade
articles.summary: Sid Meier's Civilization 7 Arcade Edition will be added to the Apple Arcade game catalog on February 5 alongside a smattering of other new games. This new version of the game will be playable on iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and there does not appear to be plans for an Android port at this time.Released last February for PC and consoles, Civilization 7 is a 4X strategy game where players guide a civilization through several different ages of history. Like the mobile port of Civilization 6, Civilization 7 Arcade Edition's content is comparable to the PC and console versions of the game, so this isn't some sort of radically inferior spin-off.The most novel thing about Civilization 7 Arcade Edition is that its UI has been specifically tailored to support touch controls on iPhone and iPad. Currently, the closest you can get to that is using the touchscreen for your cursor on a PC handheld or Nintendo Switch 2.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.long_summary: Sid Meier's Civilization 7 Arcade Edition will be added to the Apple Arcade game catalog on February 5 alongside a smattering of other new games. This new version of the game will be playable on iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and there does not appear to be plans for an Android port at this time.Released last February for PC and consoles, Civilization 7 is a 4X strategy game where players guide a civilization through several different ages of history. Like the mobile port of Civilization 6, Civilization

articles.title: Hytale Getting "Larger, More Bespoke" Updates, But Not Right Away
articles.summary: Hytale is finally out now in early access following 10 years of development and a cancellation. Like other early-access games, Hytale isn't finished and may contain bugs and other oddities as developer Hypixel updates and improves the game over time. The studio has now outlined what's to come in the immediate future, and more of what's on tap on a longer-term horizon.For the "first few months," Hypixel will release updates "quickly and frequently" to address the "backlog of obvious construction sites" that the team wants to address. For anyone just catching up, Hypixel purchased Hytale from Riot in November 2025, and in the eight weeks since, the team did what it could to get Hytale out, but this also means the team didn't get to every item it wanted to fix or address.          Looking further out, Hypixel said it plans to release "larger, more bespoke updates" and new features for Hytale. This will include official minigames, with development set to begin on these "in the coming months." These minigames will add "systems and features that expand gameplay," Hypixel said.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.long_summary: Hytale is finally out now in early access following 10 years of development and a cancellation. Like other early-access games, Hytale isn't finished and may contain bugs and other oddities as developer Hypixel updates and improves the game over time. The studio has now outlined what's to come in the immediate future, and more of what's on tap on a longer-term horizon.For the "first few months," Hypixel will release updates "quickly and frequently" to address the "backlog of obvious construction

articles.title: This sweet fruit is packed with hidden health compounds
articles.summary: Scientists are taking a closer look at monk fruit and discovering itâ€™s more than just a sugar substitute. New research shows its peel and pulp contain a rich mix of antioxidants and bioactive compounds that may support health. Different varieties offer different chemical profiles, hinting at unique benefits. The work could shape how monk fruit is used in future foods and supplements.

articles.title: Why Riot Canceled Hytale And How It Came Back To Life
articles.summary: The Minecraft-like adventure game Hytale is out now in early access, and it's been a bumpy, unusual road to release. Here is a quick primer on Hytale's lengthy development, cancellation, and resurrection, culminating in its release on January 13.Table of Contents [hide]What is Hytale?What is Hytale?Hytale is an adventure game that "blends the freedom of a sandbox with the momentum of an RPG." The game is set in a procedurally generated world that has dungeons to explore and creatures to interact with. The game has Minecraft-like stylized graphics.The game launched on January 13 in early access with "core" systems, including exploration, combat, building, minigames, and community-run servers. The game will expand over time with more features.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.long_summary: The Minecraft-like adventure game Hytale is out now in early access, and it's been a bumpy, unusual road to release. Here is a quick primer on Hytale's lengthy development, cancellation, and resurrection, culminating in its release on January 13.Table of Contents [hide]What is Hytale?What is Hytale?Hytale is an adventure game that "blends the freedom of a sandbox with the momentum of an RPG." The game is set in a procedurally generated world that has dungeons to explore and creatures to interact
